segments.text: I am still watching the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration on that one plate is absolutely unwavering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is truly in her own world, completely detached from the kitchen's reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it astonishing that she hasn't felt the water splashing or pooling around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot is already squarely in the growing puddle, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is almost infuriating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so disengaged from her immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are clearly taking advantage of her distraction, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of frustration at her complete lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be aware of what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
